name: ResourceType
description: Specifies the schema that describes a SCIM Resource Type

attributes.name: schemas
attributes.description: An array of Strings containing URI that are used to indicate the namespaces of the SCIM schemas that define the attributes present in the current JSON structure.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The resource type's server unique id. May be the same as the 'name' attribute.

attributes.name: externalId
attributes.description: Identifier for the resource as defined by the provisioning client. OPTIONAL; clients MAY include a non-empty value.

attributes.name: meta
attributes.description: Resource metadata. MUST be ignored when provided by clients.

subAttributes.name: created
subAttributes.description: The date and time the resource was added.

subAttributes.name: lastModified
subAttributes.description: The most recent date and time the resource was modified.

subAttributes.name: location
subAttributes.description: The URI of the resource being returned.

subAttributes.name: version
subAttributes.description: The version (ETag) of the resource being returned.

attributes.name: description
attributes.description: The resource type's human readable description.

attributes.name: endpoint
attributes.description: The resource type's HTTP addressable endpoint relative to the Base URL; e.g., /Users.

attributes.name: schema
attributes.description: The resource types primary/base schema URI.

attributes.name: schemaExtensions
attributes.description: A list of URIs of the resource type's schema extensions

subAttributes.name: schema
subAttributes.description: The URI of a schema extension.

subAttributes.name: required
subAttributes.description: Specifies whether the schema extension is required for the resource type.
